item.title: Pack Temperature Control Valves – Either Valve Inoperative

remarks.para: One may be inoperative closed in STBY mode provided (opposite) pack is operative in AUTO.

numlitem.para: With (opposite) pack operative in AUTO, operate affected pack in STBY N only.
With affected pack inoperative, operate remaining pack in AUTO.

placard.para: Placard near affected Pack Control Selector "PACK TEMPERATURE CONTROL VALVE INOP CLOSED. OPERATE IN STBY N ONLY" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To verify that valve is inoperative in the closed position gain access to valve by opening appropriate left or right ECS access door (193HL or 194ER).
Disconnect, cap and stow both electrical connectors on Pack Temperature control Valve.
Check the visual position indicator in the closed position. If not, rotate the manual override knob until the position indicator moves to the closed position.
Verify the ram air inlet and exhaust doors in the full open position.
